page.title: 11My Life Today. 8 years
page.content: This is what I would like to tell the children of the future about my life today.I am Katie,aged eight,and I live in Henley.When I grow up,I might be a groom or a show jumper.I go horse riding and have judo lessons.I live in a modern house and it has nine rooms.We have a big garden and it is nice.I have a brother Thomas aged four and he will be coming to Harpsden School before he is five years old.Every weekday I go to School to learn.In the morning I come into School to start work before 09.00. We have Reading,Assembly,Writing,Maths and then we have Projects,Art and Games We also have Religious Education,Drama, Science and Music.I play the recorder and glockenspiel.We have concerts at School and a Music Festival with the other Primary Schools in our area and I play in them.I play in our Assembly and in our Services at Harpsden Church.
